trans-unit.source: This form should not contain extra fields.
trans-unit.target: Dës Feldergrupp sollt keng zousätzlech Felder enthalen.

trans-unit.source: The uploaded file was too large. Please try to upload a smaller file.
trans-unit.target: De geschécktene Fichier ass ze grouss. Versicht wann ech gelift ee méi klenge Fichier eropzelueden.

trans-unit.source: The CSRF token is invalid. Please try to resubmit the form.
trans-unit.target: Den CSRF-Token ass ongëlteg. Versicht wann ech gelift de Formulaire nach eng Kéier ze schécken.
